Cell.Data: Anything between straight brackets - i.e. [ ] - is a formatting tag. Do not change these tags and keep them in the same relative position in the text. Anything between curly brackets - i.e. { } - is a place where text or numbers will be inserted by the game. Do not change the tag, but feel free to change its position in the text to suit the localized text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
Deal Arc Damage to a unit. This attack jumps {ScramblingJumpTime} times to other enemy units within {ScramblingJumpRange} hexes.
The unit is {WetwareEvade} harder to hit by ranged attacks. They also become [abilityblue]Integrated[/abilityblue], allowing them to interface with Synthesis technology.
Integrated is a status effect that allows the unit to be the target of beneficial effects
The unit gains {InformationAccuracy} accuracy and {InformationCrit} critical hit chance. They also become [abilityblue]Integrated[/abilityblue], allowing them to interface with Synthesis technology.
Integrated is a status effect that allows the unit to be the target of beneficial effects
A Targeting Daemon is [abilityblue]Integrated[/abilityblue] with this unit, increasing their accuracy by {InformationAccuracy} and their critical hit chance by {InformationCrit}.
Weapon attacks now have a strength {CompromisedChance} chance to apply [abilityred]Compromised[/abilityred] to Mechanical and Cyborg units.
Compromised is a negative status effect that debuffs enemy units.

Provides the unit with a Daemon Shell containing an Incapacitate Daemon that they can deploy to disrupt enemy units. They also become [abilityblue]Integrated[/abilityblue], allowing them to interface with Synthesis technology.
A Daemon is a computer virus controlled by an artificial intelligence. A Shell is a physical container, like a metal box, that contains the Daemon. They deploy the Daemon from this 'box'.

Infect target enemy Mechanical or Cyborg unit with a hostile Daemon. This causes the unit to have a {DisabledCompromisedChance} strength chance to be [abilityred]Stunned[/abilityred] for {DisableTurn}. On failure, the unit is staggered instead.
A Daemon is a computer virus controlled by an artificial intelligence.

The unit is immune to stagger and all status effects. If the unit dies in combat, they are revived with {NetworkReviveHP} of their maximum [hp/] at the start of the next turn. By creating an emergency backup of this unit's conciousness, they also become [abilityblue]Integrated[/abilityblue], allowing them to interface with Synthesis technology.
Integrated is a status effect that allows the unit to be the target of beneficial effects. The emergency backup is a 'download' of the unit's soul onto computer hardware.
Deploys a drone inhabited by a Malware Daemon.
A Daemon is a computer virus controlled by an artificial intelligence.
Deploy the Malware Daemon drone. It has a ranged Arc attack, and if destroyed, will attempt to [abilityred]Mind Control[/abilityred] a nearby enemy Mechanical or Cyborg unit.
A Daemon is a computer virus controlled by an artificial intelligence.

All Mechanical and Cyborg units are [abilityblue]Integrated[/abilityblue], allowing them to interface with Synthesis technology.[br/]All militia units you control become [abilityblue]Integrated[/abilityblue].
Integrated is a status effect that allows the unit to be the target of beneficial effects
The unit is integrated with Synthesis technology, allowing it to communicate with Synthesis networks and Daemons.
Integrated is a status effect that allows the unit to be the target of beneficial effects
This unit is a Synthesis Unit.
This unit has been [abilityred]Compromised[/abilityred]. They lose {CompromisedStaggerReduction} level of stagger resistance and their Arc resistance is reduced by {CompromisedArcResist}.
Compromised is a negative status effect that debuffs enemy units.
{CompromisedChance} strength chance to apply [abilityred]Compromised[/abilityred] to Mechanical and Cyborg units.
Fire a repeating Arc weapon at an enemy target.
This unit has been forcibly integrated with a Malware Daemon, and is [abilityred]Mind Controlled[/abilityred] until end of combat, after which it is destroyed.
A Daemon is a computer virus controlled by an artificial intelligence.

Upon destruction of its shell, the Malware Daemon will try to forcibly integrate with a random enemy Mechanical or Cyborg unit within {EmergencyRange} hexes. The enemy unit will have a strength {EmergencyChance} chance to be [abilityred]Mind Controlled[/abilityred] and switch allegiance until the end of combat. On failure, the unit is [abilityred]Compromised[/abilityred] instead. If the unit switches allegiance, they will become [abilityblue]Integrated[/abilityblue] as well.
A Daemon is a computer virus controlled by an artificial intelligence. Compromised is a negative status effect that debuffs enemy units.
Fire a Hasher SMG at an enemy target.
Hasher is a made up word
Fire a Breach SMG at an enemy target.

Target enemy Mechanical or Cyborg unit is forcibly infected with a hostile Daemon. They have a strength {HaywireChanceCompromised} chance to become [abilityred]Disabled[/abilityred] for {HaywireTurnCompromised}.
A Daemon is a computer virus controlled by an artificial intelligence.
This unit is forcibly infected with a Haywire Daemon.
Target a dead Mechanical or Cyborg unit to send a Daemon that will reconstruct the scrap into a Reconstructed Daemon unit.
A Daemon is a computer virus controlled by an artificial intelligence.
Throw a grenade that explodes in shrapnel, dealing damage to enemy units. Each piece of shrapnel contains a [abilityred]Compromising Virus[/abilityred].
With Virus, we mean a computer virus that negatively effects the systems of the enemy unit.
Shouldn't the hex radius of the grenade's damage be specified here?
Fire a small defensive firearms turret at a target.
Upload an artificial consciousness to a susceptible unit. This resets target friendly [abilityblue]Integrated[/abilityblue] unit's cooldowns and once per battle abilities.
The artificial consciousness (AC) is the soul of a being, converted into computer software. Integrated is a status effect that allows the unit to be the target of beneficial effects
Target a non-Mindless dead unit to download the vestiges of its consciousness. The corpse is destroyed and the Upload AC Data ability is reset.
The artificial consciousness (AC) is the soul of a being, converted into computer software. Integrated is a status effect that allows the unit to be the target of beneficial effects
Extend the duration of all active Daemons, both friendly and hostile, on the whole battlefield by {IntegrityEnforcementTime}.
A Daemon is a computer virus controlled by an artificial intelligence.

Sends a Daemon to interface with target [abilityblue]Integrated[/abilityblue] unit, resetting their status. The unit has all hostile effects dispelled, becomes immune to all status effects and regains {ResetSaveStateDaemonHP} of their maximum [hp/] at the start of the turn for {ResetSaveStateDaemonTime}.
A Daemon is a computer virus controlled by an artificial intelligence.
This unit is being restored, regaining {ResetSaveStateDaemonHP} of their maximum [hp/] at the start of each turn.
Use an arc node to fire a Disruption Virus at target enemy unit. This attack jumps {DisruptionJumpAmount} times to other enemy units within {DisruptionJumpRange} hexes.
With Virus, we mean a computer virus that negatively effects the systems of the enemy unit.
Deal Arc damage to target unit. This attack jumps {CascadeJumpAmount} times within {CascadeJumpRange} hexes.

Target enemy Mechanical or Cyborg unit is forcibly infected with a hostile Daemon that attempts to wrest control of the unit. They have a strength {DisabledCompromisedChance} chance to become [abilityred]Mind Controlled[/abilityred] and switch allegiance until end of combat. On failure, the unit is [abilityred]Disabled[/abilityred] instead.
A Daemon is a computer virus controlled by an artificial intelligence.
This unit is controlled by a Override Daemon and is [abilityred]Mind Controlled[/abilityred].

Send a friendly Daemon to interface with target friendly unit, boosting it immensely. The unit deals {AmplifyDaemonDam} damage, and gains {AmplifyDaemonResist} level of Impact resistance and Fast Movement. The unit also becomes [abilityblue]Integrated[/abilityblue]. This lasts for {duration}.
A Daemon is a computer virus controlled by an artificial intelligence.

A friendly Daemon has [abilityblue]Integrated[/abilityblue] with this unit, boosting its abilities. They deal +{AmplifyDaemonDam} damage, and have gained {AmplifyDaemonResist} level of Impact resistance and Fast Movement.
A Daemon is a computer virus controlled by an artificial intelligence.
Uploads protective subroutines to all [abilityblue]Integrated[/abilityblue] units. They receive {AegisSubroutinesShield} for {AegisSubroutinesTurns}
Subroutines are a positive kind of computer virus, which boosts the abilities of friendly units.
This unit has active protective subroutines. Their shields are increased by {AegisSubroutinesShield}.

Target enemy unit takes {DisruptionPulseDam} Arc damage. If this ability targets Mechanical or Cyborg unit, it has a strength {DisruptionPulseChance} chance to cause the target to become [abilityred]Compromised[/abilityred]. This ability jumps up to {Disruption PulseJump} times to other enemy units within {Disruption PulseHexes} hexes.
With Virus, we mean a computer virus that negatively effects the systems of the enemy unit. Compromised is a negative status effect that debuffs enemy units.

Send out a targeted hacking signal to interfere with enemy Mechanical and Cyborg units in a {Radius} hex area of effect, staggering all units with [abilityred]Massive Impact[/abilityred]. In addition, they have a strength {ImmobilizeChance} chance to become [abilityred]Immobilized[/abilityred] for {duration}.
With hacking we are referring to computer hacking.

Uploads repair subroutines to all friendly [abilityblue]Integrated[/abilityblue] units. They heal for {RepairSubroutinesHeal} of their maximum [hp/] at the end of each turn for {RepairSubroutinesTurns}.
Subroutines are a positive kind of computer virus, which boosts the abilities of friendly units.
This unit has active repair subroutines. They heal for {RepairSubroutinesHeal} of their maximum [hp/] at the start of each turn.

Sends out a targeted hacking signal to interfere with enemy Mechanical and Cyborg units in a {Radius} hex area of effect. They have a strength {DisableChance} chance to become [abilityred]Disabled[/abilityred] for {duration}. If resisted, the units will be Staggered instead.

Uploads combat subroutines to all friendly [abilityblue]Integrated[/abilityblue] units. They gain +{SkirmishImpactIncrease} Impact resistance and deal +{SkirmishDamageIncrease} damage for {SkirmishTurns}.
Subroutines are a positive kind of computer virus, which boosts the abilities of friendly units.
This unit has active combat subroutines. They deal +{SkirmishDamageIncrease} damage.

All Mechanical and Cyborg units in target enemy army take {InternalSystemOverloadHackHP} of their current [hp/] in damage. Units damaged this way are [abilityred]Compromised[/abilityred] at the start of every battle for {InternalSystemOverloadHackTime} strategic turn.
On failure, all Mechanical and Cyborg units take {InternalSystemOverloadHackHP} of their current [hp/] in damage.
Our systems hack was successful, and the enemy army's Mechanical and Cyborg troops have suffered damage. Furthermore, the systems on these units have been compromised for a short period of time.
Our systems hack was partially averted by the enemy army. We have managed to inflict minor damage, but their systems are unfortunately not compromised.
Your army has been hacked! All of its Mechanical and Cyborg units have been damaged and are compromised for a short period of time.
An attempted hack on your army has been averted. Mechanical and Cyborg units have received minor damage but their systems have not been further compromised.
Mechanical and Cyborg units in army are damaged for {Damage} of their [hp/].
Mechanical and Cyborg units in army are [abilityred]Compromised[/abilityred] for {turns}.
Target enemy colony has their operational defense reduced by {Zero-DayVulnerabilityAmount} and their happiness reduced by {Zero-DayVulnerabilityHappiness} for {Zero-DayVulnerabilityTime}
We have successfully exploited a zero-day vulnerability in the enemy colony! Their operational network has been weakened, and their population morale has been reduced.
We attempted to exploit a zero-day vulnerability in the enemy colony. Unfortunately, we were stopped before we could complete our mission, but our attempt has caused civil unrest in the colony.

Enemy hackers have exploited vulnerabilities in our colony's security. They have successfully breached our operation defense systems and weakened them. The attack has left our population with a lower morale.

Enemy hackers attempted to exploit vulnerabilities in our colony's security. We have managed to stop their attempts before they did any major damage, however the population is undergoing civil unrest from their efforts.
{UnhappinessAmount} was caused and operational defense has been reduced by {OperationalDefense Reduction} for {turns}.

All [abilityblue]Integrated[/abilityblue] units in target friendly army heal to full [hp/] and gain [abilityblue]Finely-tuned[/abilityblue] for {duration} strategic turn, granting them +{accuracy} accuracy and +{damage} damage.
A Daemon is a computer virus controlled by an artificial intelligence.
This unit has been finely tuned by maintenance daemons. They gain +{accuracy} accuracy and +{damage} damage.
Reactivating local imperial androids can provide quick reinforcements in the field. Summon a single android unit at target location. Can only summon a tier 1 or tier 2 unit.
Target enemy colony's income is reduced by {CascadingAmount} for {CascadingTime}.
We have successfully caused a cascading system failure in the enemy colony. Their economic systems have been weakened.
We attempted to cause a cascading system failure in the enemy colony. Unfortunately, we were stopped before we could complete our mission, but our attempt has caused civil unrest in the colony.
Enemy hackers have exploited vulnerabilities in our colony's security. They have successfully hacked into our economic systems and reduced our income.

Enemy hackers attempted to exploit vulnerabilities in our colony's security. We managed to stop their attempts before they did any major damage, but their efforts has caused civil unrest in our population.
Income has been reduced with {IncomeModifier} for {turns}.

Optimize and strengthen our cyberwarfare division in times of war, allowing for more brutal cyber-attacks and increased efficiency.[br/][br/]Gain {OperationStrengthModifier} for all operations. In addition, strategic operations are now {StrategicCostModifier} cheaper.

With a few minor cyber augmentations, we can integrate our factory workers into the network, massively boosting their efficiency.[br/][br/][production/] and [energy/] slots produce {SlotProductionModifier} of their respective resource per colonist working it.
slots refer to work spaces you can assign colonists to in game

Computers are everywhere, do everything, and see all. Our people are fully integrated into a digital paradise of consumerism and hedonism, and they love us for it.[br/][br/]All Colonies gain {HappinessModifier} and produce {EnergyModefier}.

Total integration of synthesis technology into war factories leads to massive gains in efficiency and effectiveness of compatible units.[br/][br/]All Mechanical and Cyborg units gain {RankModifier} extra rank when produced, and cost {EnergyModifier}.

Launch a cyber attack on a non-Synthesis enemy colony, infiltrating their systems and linking them up to the Basilisk network for {INT_duration}. This ability causes greater havoc the more Basilisk Nodes you build.
Our cyber attack was successful in infiltrating their systems and we now have access to their network.
Our cyber attack was intercepted by the enemy, preventing us from linking their systems to the Basilisk network.
The enemy launched a cyber attack and broke through into our systems! We will need to spend some time clearing and securing our systems.
Our defenses succesfully prevented the enemy from infiltrating our systems with their cyber attack.
Link the entire planet together in the Basilisk network, bringing it all under under your control, granting absolute power.[br/][br/]Requires Cyber Attack level 3.
The Basilisk Network is now active at its fullest potential, covering the planet in an intricate web of data flow and logic control. It is only a matter of time before ultimate victory is ours!

The Basilisk Node unlocks the Cyber Attack Doomsday Weapon. Each additional Basilisk Node that you build increases the level of the weapon, making it stronger.[br/][br/]Only one Basilisk Node may be built per colony.
Interconnect all systems and lifeforms into the massive Basilisk network so that it can be controlled.
Knowledge income reduced by {NetworkResearchTheft}. The Synthesis player gains this Knowledge instead.
Possible gender specific text required.<REPLACED RESEARCH WITH KNOWLEDGE>
Knowledge income reduced by {NetworkResearchTheft}. The Synthesis player gains this Knowledge instead.[br/]Synthesis player units gain {NetworkAcc} accuracy and {NetworkCrit} critical hit chance.
Possible gender specific text required.<REPLACED RESEARCH WITH KNOWLEDGE>
This unit has {NetworkAcc} accuracy and {NetworkCrit} critical hit chance.

Knowledge income reduced by {NetworkResearchTheft}. The Synthesis player gains this Knowledge instead.[br/]Synthesis player units gain {NetworkAcc} accuracy and {NetworkCrit} critical hit chance.[br/]Non-Synthesis player units which are [abilityred]Compromised[/abilityred] have a {NetworkDaemonChance} strength chance to be infected by a [abilityred]Incapacitate[/abilityred] or [abilityred]Haywire[/abilityred] Daemon each turn.
A Daemon is a computer virus controlled by an artificial intelligence. Compromised is a negative status effect that debuffs enemy units.
Possible gender specific text required. <REPLACED RESEARCH WITH KNOWLEDGE>

All non-Synthesis Mechanical and Cyborg units that are [abilityred]Compromised[/abilityred] have {NetworkDaemonChance} strength chance at the start of each turn to be infected by a [abilityred]Incapacitate[/abilityred] or a [abilityred]Haywire[/abilityred] Daemon.
A Daemon is a computer virus controlled by an artificial intelligence. Compromised is a negative status effect that debuffs enemy units.
One of our Basilisk Nodes has been captured!
Our or your? We need to keep this conistent. Are we referring to the player/commander (singular) or the empire (plural)
You have lost a Basilisk Node!
STR_Player is the name of the leader in game. Can be male or female
You have lost a Basilisk Node. Our attempt at unleashing The Singularity has been canceled!
{STR_Player} has lost a Basilisk Node. Their attempt at unleashing The Singularity has been foiled!
STR_Player is the name of the leader in game. Can be male or female
A Player has unleashed The Singularity!
By building a Basilisk Node, {playerName} now has access to their Doomsday Weapon, The Singularity. It is weak now, but will become more powerful as more Basilisk Nodes are constructed.
playername is the name of a leader in game, can be male or female.

By building a second Basilisk Node, {playerName} has strengthened their Doomsday Weapon, The Singularity. You should plan raids to destroy these Basilisk Node structures, before they become too powerful.
playername is the name of a leader in game, can be male or female.

By building their final Basilisk Node, {playerName} has maximized the strength of their Doomsday Weapon, The Singularity. They are now close to being able to fully unleash it, winning the game. The time to strike is now!
playername is the name of a leader in game, can be male or female.
The Doomsday Timer has been paused! You must reclaim the lost Basilisk Node, or you will lose your chance at unleashing The Singularity upon your enemies!
The loss of a Basilisk Node has canceled The Singularity, ending the Doomsday Timer.
The loss of a Basilisk Node has weakened The Singularity, and your Doomsday operations have been canceled.

Our enemies have activated their Doomsday Weapon, The Singularity has spread across the planet, and your own Doomsday Weapon has been wiped out by the cataclysm. You have {numTurns} to destroy one of their Basilisk Nodes, otherwise they will win the game.
The Singularity is active, and you will win in {numTurns} unless you lose one of your Basilisk Nodes.
The Singularity is active, and {playerName} will win in {numTurns} unless you can destroy one of their Basilisk Nodes.
A Basilisk Node has been captured! If it is destroyed, our Doomsday Timer will be canceled. If you recapture it, you will be able to resume the countdown.
A Basilisk Node has been captured. If it is destroyed, the Doomsday Timer will be canceled. If {playerName} recaptures it, they will be able to resume the countdown.
{playerName} is priming The Singularity Doomsday Weapon. If they are allowed to complete it, your own Doomsday Weapon will be wiped out, and {playerName} will be but one step away from total victory!
playername is the name of a leader in game, can be male or female.
You have achieved Synthesis.[br/]The minds of man and machine merge[br/]in a new phase of evolution.[br/]A great web of knowledge and ideas -[br/]or an eternal prison for the soul.
VO: Empress Carminia Synthesis is a state of transcendance where man is merged with machine, their consciousness merged with technology.
